alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 9:22AM CDT until April 13 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Minor over bank is flooding is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 29.5 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 28.6 Sun 8 am CDT 29.1 29.5 29.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
